name: Sapphire in 18k Pendant
description:
The color of this natural, untreated sapphire is really remarkable, a gorgeous cornflower blue that changes beautifully with the light. 

Not much was needed to set off the sapphire's beauty, and so I've bezel set it and finished it with an elegant bail and granule. 

Simple, lovely, and perfect for a sapphire-lover!

The sapphire measures 5.5 mm, and the pendant is a bit over 1/2 inch in length. By itself, the pendant is $275. If you'd like an 18 inch, 14k cable chain included, the cost is $350.

This pretty thing is ready to ship!

name: Sterling Bubble Ring
description:
The hand forged, sterling Bubble Ring measures 5/8 wide, and is full of bubbles of varying sizes. I've finished it in a lovely, modern satin finish. A great ring for a man or woman. 

This ring is a size 9, and ready to ship. If you would like me to size this piece for you, it will be ready to ship in 2 days. If you would prefer your band polished to a lovely shine, just let me know!

Because of the width of this band, it's advisable to order a half size up from your regular size.

name: Gold and Silver Tourmaline Ring
description:
I just love this stone: a beautifully included blue-green tourmaline cab, cut by the talented Cary Robbins. I've set the stone in an 18k bezel, paired with a sterling, scrolled ring band and finished with an 18k granule on each side. 

The tourmaline measures 15.5 x 12.8 mm, and weighs 8.1 ct. The front of the ring measures 7/8 inch from side to side, and is a size 6.5. I'd be happy to resize this ring for you.

This ring is ready to ship, or will ship in 3 days if you would like me to resize it.

name: Blue Tourmaline Earrings in 18k and Silver
description:
Gorgeous blue tourmalines, bezelled in 18k and backed with silver I've cast from cuttlefish* bone. They're finished with an 18k loop and granule, and hang from handmade 18k ear wires. 

I have a huge crush on these earrings! Lately, I've been playing with using gold and silver together, and I really like the way the two metals come together here. And that blue! Is there any other stone that glows like an indicolite tourmaline? 

The stones measure 5 mm, and from the top of the ear wire to the bottom of the charm, the earrings measure 1 1/2 inches long. The charm measures 3/4 x 7/16 inches.

These pretty things are ready to ship.



*CUTTLEFISH BONE CASTING: Cuttlefish are a relative of squid, and inside their heads they have a soft, porous "bone." This bone washes up on beaches after the cuttlefish dies and provides a meal to all the other oceanic critters (mmm, dead cuttlefish). You might have seen one before in the pet store; they are used in pet birds' cages to provide them with calcium. For thousands of years, goldsmiths have used them to aid in forming jewelry. We saw them in half, carve them to make molds, and pour molten gold into them. The cooled metal retains the texture of the cuttlefish bone. Pretty cool, huh?

name: Diamond and Silver Full Moon Pendant
description:
This lovely one-of-a-kind sterling silver piece is set with three sparkly VS2 diamonds (two 2mm, one 1.8mm). The pendant is slightly convex, and measures a bit over 18mm in diameter. The bail is hand forged and the piece hangs on an 18 inch sterling chain.

This piece is ready to ship.

name: Green Tourmaline in 18k and Silver Ring
description:
A beautiful, big green tourmaline! This is a great stone, and I hope I've done it justice.

The stone is 3ct and measures 8 x 10 mm, and I've set it in a handforged, bimetal setting. The bezel is 18k yellow gold, which I've flanked with more 18k detail on either side. Contrasting that, the band is lovely, sturdy forged sterling. The green is the color of old, antique bottles. I love it!

This pretty piece is a size 7.5, and is ready to ship. If you'd like me to size it for you, it will ship in 3 days.

name: Ruby in 18k Ring
description:
A simple ring that is all about the stone!

I've set a gorgeous 8mm ruby in a simple setting that I've forged of 18k. The ruby is real, and is fracture-filled. 

I just love rubies, and the way they change in different lighting. The first three pictures were taken in the sun, and the last two were taken in my studio. Tonight, in the dimmed light of my house, the ruby is a pure red, and I wish I could show you a picture of that, too!

This pretty ring is a size 8, and is ready to ship. If you would like me to size it for you, please allow an extra 3 days to ship.

*For a smaller version of this ring, please see my Ruby Kiss Ring on my regular site: vakadesign.com.

name: Wide Sterling Cuttlefish Bone Cast Ring- Unisex
description:
Hand cast from cuttlefish* bone, this wide sterling ring has a lovely, rippling texture. I've polished it smooth, smooth, smooth, and then oxidized it to bring out the depth of pattern. This is a neat piece to play with! This is a great men's band, and perfect for a woman looking for a chunkier piece. 

This one of a kind ring is 1/2 inch wide, and is a size 8.5. It is ready to ship! 

*IF YOU WOULD LIKE THIS IN A DIFFERENT SIZE please just let me know, and I'd be happy to make one for you (3-5 days to ship).







*CUTTLEFISH BONE CASTING: Cuttlefish are a relative of squid, and inside their heads they have a soft, porous "bone." This bone washes up on beaches after the cuttlefish dies and provides a meal to all the other oceanic critters (mmm, dead cuttlefish). You might have seen one before in the pet store; they are used in pet birds' cages to provide them with calcium. For thousands of years, goldsmiths have used them to aid in forming jewelry. We saw them in half, carve them to make molds, and pour molten gold into them. The cooled metal retains the texture of the cuttlefish bone. Pretty cool, huh?

name: Mabe Pearl in Sterling Ring
description:
This ring is just begging for a trip to the beach! You, your sun-kissed fingers, this ring....taking a long stroll on the beach at sunset. It's a ring love story, just waiting to happen!

A 12mm mabe pearl set in cool sterling....gorgeous. 

This ring is made to order in your size, and ready to ship in 5 days.

name: 18k Gold and Silver Checkboard Earrings
description:
I've combined sterling and warm 18k gold to create a modern earring that goes with everything! They swing and catch the light beautifully.

A bigger earring, the rectangle measures a bit over 1 1/4 x 3/4 inches, and dangles 1 3/8 inches from the top of the 18k ear wire to the bottom of the earring. The back of the earring is hammered silver.

These cool earrings are one of a kind and ready to ship!

name: Bottle Green Sea Glass in Sterling Ring
description:
When I was little, I'd spend the summers on the coast of Maine with my grandparents. Each year we'd take the mail boat out to Little Cranberry Island, and spend hours picnicking and "beach" combing (Maine's "beaches" are rocky). My favorites finds were always sea glass, and today Maine sea glass is one of my favorite "gems" to work with. 

We still have the house in Maine, and everyone knows to keep their eyes open for pretty pieces as they go exploring. This piece was found by either me or a member of my family during one of our summers in Maine. 

The sea glass measures 20 x 15 mm, and I've set it in a brushed sterling, hand forged setting. 
This ring is a size 6.5, and it is ready to ship. I can size this ring up a bit, and then it would be ready to ship in ten days.

name: 18k Byzantine Crescent Earrings
description:
These pretty things are a copy of a pair I made for myself years ago, to wear on my first date with my sweetheart. He is still my sweetheart, and they are still my favorite earrings!

They measure an inch across, and are forged in 18k. They are quite thin and light, and yet strong enough to last forever. 

These pretty earrings are ready to ship.

name: 14k Crescent Moon with Diamond Pendant with Chain
description:
A one-of-a-kind moon, just for you. This one is a waning crescent, and measures an inch long from the top of the bail to the bottom edge. I've set this pretty crescent with a .07 (2.7mm) VS2 sparkly diamond, and it hangs from a 20 inch, 14k cable chain (as pictured).

If you would like this pendant WITHOUT the chain, the cost for the pendant alone is $325. Just contact me, and I'll adjust the listing.

Each moon I make is unique, and so there will never be another just like this guy. I'm enjoying making these pieces, and I'll keep doing so until they stop being fun!

This pretty thing is ready to ship.

Each piece from my shop is designed, made, finished, and shipped by me and only me.

name: Moissanite in 18k Gold Necklace
description:
A 5.5 mm Forever Brilliant moissanite (.5 ct), set in a granulated, 18k setting. A beautiful alternative to the standard diamond pendant!

The pendant measures 17mm from the top of the bail to the bottom granule, and is about 7mm wide. 

The price includes the 20 inch, 14k chain. If you are just interested in purchasing the pendant, the cost is $350. Contact me, and I'll happily amend the listing for you.


This pretty thing is ready to ship, and will arrive with Charles & Colvard's Forever Brilliant certification

MOISSANITE:

Now, let's talk about moissanite. I have always felt quite strongly about using only natural, untreated gems. I've been a bit loud about this! So why am I now jumping on the moissanite bandwagon? 

Moissanite first caught my eye when Charles & Colvard recently introduced their newest moissanite line, Forever Brilliant. While older generations of moissanite were creamier-looking than real white diamonds, C&C's Forever Brilliant hit the nail on the head. It is as clear and white as a white diamond, with BETTER optical properties. It's light dispersion is 2.4 better than a natural diamond, and it is higher on the refractive index scale (meaning more brilliance). 

It's very pretty, but lots of things are very pretty: how does it hold up? Nothing wears and holds up like a diamond, right? After all, it was diamond's hardness that propelled it to be used thousands of years ago as a symbol of unbreakable state contracts and treaties, eventually coming to be used to symbolize unbreakable wedding vows. A diamond is the hardest mineral on Earth, a 10 on the Mohs scale, followed by sapphires at 9. Well, moissanite is a 9.25. That is really, really hard, and moissanite is going to hold up to all the wear and tear you can give it. 

And the clincher? Charles and Colvard back their stone with a certification of authenticity and a life time warranty. 

I'm sold. Will I now stop using diamonds? No! A diamond is a diamond, but Forever Brilliant is a beautiful, affordable, earth-friendly alternative.

For the history of moissanite: http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Moissanite

name: 18k Groovy Dangle Earrings
description:
When I was just a little Vakadesign, I used to love playing with my Mom's jewelry. Mom--being a very fashionable hippie--had very groovy jewelry, especially earrings. Making Mom's earrings THAT MUCH cooler was her rule: we could not wear dangle earrings until we were teens.

This is my version of one of my favorite pairs of Mom's earrings. Forged in 18k, they are light and strong. The charm of the earring measures 29mm x 33mm. From the top of the 18k earwire to the bottom of the earring measures 57mm.

Elegant, a bit groovy, and perennially chic. These earrings are made to wear with just about everything, and will last forever.

Ready to ship.

name: Blue Sapphire in 18k Ring
description:
A beautiful .80ct , vvs sapphire set in a handforged 18k setting. The natural stone measures 7.09 x 5.17mm, and is a lovely cornflower blue. The 18k sets off the blue so nicely!

This stone is NOT beryllium treated, as so many currently on the market are. This sapphire is only heat-treated, which is an industry standard. It's a lovely, lovely stone. It just sparkles.

This pretty thing is a size 7, and is ready to ship. I'd be happy to size it for you, and then it would be ready to ship in 3 days

name: Coca-Cola Brown Diamond in 18k Gold Pendant
description:
Far warmer than irradiated jet-black diamonds, this cola-colored stone is untreated, lustrous, and has tones of brown and red. I've set it in a hand forged 18k setting that reminds me a bit of an Indian bindi.

The diamond is a 1.4 ct stone, and measures approximately 6 x 8 (the stone, like most large natural dark diamonds, has a tiny pit. It can be seen to the right of the top of the stone in picture 3). The pendant measures 25mm from top to bottom.

This listing is for the pendant WITHOUT a chain. If you would like me to include a 20 inch, 14k chain, the cost would be $455. Let me know if you need the chain, and I will amend the listing for you!

This piece is ready to ship.

name: Almondine Garnet in Granulated 18k setting
description:
Isn't this pretty? I'm so pleased with how it turned out! 

This is a 4.18ct pyrope-almondine garnet cut by lapidary artist Carey Robbins. The stone measures 11.6mm x 7.2mm, and the way the light plays through the stone is really breathtaking. I've hand forged an 18k setting with 25 wee gold granules encircling the bezel.

The face of the ring measures about 15mm x 7mm, and I've made it in a size 7. 

This piece is ready to ship, unless you'd like me to size it for you. If you need it sized, the ring would be ready to ship in 3 days.

name: Double Sapphire Dangles
description:
Two beautiful, deep blue sapphire cabochons sit above two twinkling white sapphires. Set in handforged 14k, and hung from 14k lever-backs.

The blues are 2 carats each, and the whites are .25 each, and super sparkly. From the top of the charm to the bottom of the white sapphire, these earrings measure about 1 1/4 inches.

I love how these move and sparkle!

If you'd like to custom order this style in a different sapphire color combination* or gem combination, just let me know. These are made to order, and will be ready to ship in 10 days.

*Sapphires naturally occur in a wide range of colors.

name: Diamond and 14k Full Moon Pendant
description:
Bella Luna! Very one of a kind, and very cool. Somewhere, an astronomy buff is longing for this pendant. The moon, just for you.

The slightly convex disk of the moon measures 15mm across (a tiny bit smaller than a dime), and 22mm from the top of the bail to the bottom of the disk. Two VS diamonds (2mm and 1.2mm) sparkle from the craters of this 14k piece. 

Price includes the 18 inch cable chain, but if you'd like the pendant without the chain ($275) just convo me before ordering.

name: Champagne Diamond and 14k Dangle Earrings
description:
Warm and glowy, rich and relaxed. These are terrific wear-all-the-time earrings which can be dressed up or down.

Two .22 ct champagne diamonds set in 14k cuttlefish* bone-cast gold. Earrings measure about 10mm across and 26mm from the top of the ear wire to the bottom of the dangle. The locking ear wires on this pair are 18k (I ran out of 14k!), and they are finished with a pretty gold granule.

These earrings are made to order in 3 days.



*For those who are not familiar with cuttlefish bone casting, here goes: Cuttlefish are a relative of squid, and inside their heads they have a soft, porous "bone." This bone washes up on beaches after the cuttlefish dies and provides a meal to all the other oceanic critters (mmm, dead cuttlefish). You might have seen one before in the pet store; they are used in pet birds' cages to provide them with calcium. Goldsmiths, for thousands of years, have used them to aid in forming jewelry. We saw them in half, carve them to make molds, and pour molten gold into them. The cooled metal retains the texture of the cuttlefish bone. Pretty cool, huh?

name: Emerald in 18k hand forged setting
description:
Oh, I just love a good emerald! 

This stone is a natural, 5mm cabochon in a strong, vibrant green. It's really a beautiful stone! I've set it in 18k with a nice heavy bezel, flanked by two wee granules (I do love my granules!). I love the way the higher karat gold has made the green pop!

This ring is made to order in your size, and ready to ship in 5 days.

name: Silver Byzantine Crescent Earrings
description:
This crescent shape is often seen in ancient Byzantine jewelry, and I think it's still a knock-out today. Relaxed, easy to wear, my own pair is my daily go-to earring.

Hammered sterling, each earring measures an inch wide, and 1 and 3/8 inches from the top of the ear wire to the bottom of the crescent. The front of the ear wire is finished with a wee granule, also commonly found in Byzantine jewelry.

Love, love, love these.

name: Aquamarines in 18k Gold Earrings
description:
I love jewelry that looks timeless; as if it could be worn today, but also could have been worn 400 or even 2000 years ago. These have that feel.

The soft blue aquamarine cabs are set in hand forged 18k settings, and have self-locking 18k ear wires so that you don't lose your treasures. The gems measure 10 x 12 (10.76 cts, combined weight), and the earrings are 33mm long from the top of the earwire to the bottom of the dangle. 

Beautifully feminine without being fussy, these pretty things would be equally at home with jeans, resort wear, or a beautiful dress.

These are ready to ship.

name: Big Gold Ring
description:
A comfortable, chunky-looking ring, but without the chunk.

A 14k gold ring with gently curving, irregular lines. Cut low in the back for comfort, high in the front for maximum bling effect, and the perfect weight for comfort. Lightly hammered and polished to a high shine. It looks like a big ring, but acts like a little one. Your fingers will be happy.

1/2 inch wide in front, narrowing to about 1/8 in the back, and made from recycled gold.

Available in sizes 5-9, ready to ship in 3 days.

name: Pink Tourmaline And Silver Ring
description:
A lovely pink tourmaline cabochon, set in sterling silver. The tourmaline is 5.47 carats, and measures 11.39 x 10.42. I purchased this stone years ago because I liked its wee little orange inclusion off to one side; it's as if the stone has a secret. 

This ring is a size 7.5, and is ready to ship!  If you'd like for me to size this ring, it will be ready to ship in 3 days.

name: Mabe Pearl in Sterling Necklace
description:
A lovely cool-toned mabe pearl in a hand forged sterling setting. I've finished it with a delicate bail, graced with a silver granule. The pendant measures 13mm wide and 21mm from the top to bottom, and hangs on an 18 inch sterling chain.

Elegant, timeless, graceful.

This necklace ships in 5 days.

name: Diamond in tiny 14k Pendant
description:
A 2mm VS diamond set into a 9 x 7mm 14k gold oval. From the top of the bail to the bottom of the pendant measures 12mm. 

This is a lovely little sparkly thing! Perfect as a treat for yourself or as a gift for a teenage girl.

Because so many of us have random chains floating around our houses, I'm happy to offer the pendant with or without a chain. The cost for the pendant only is $95. If you would like me to include the 20 inch, 14k cable chain (shown), the cost is $160.

It would also be a nice charm for a charm bracelet!

name: Ruby Majesty Ring
description:
A glowing ruby sits in a solid, handforged 14k setting. 

Until c.1400, gemcutters had not yet mastered faceting, and the cabochon was king of the cuts. I love the jelly colored ruby set up high and away from the band; it makes this ring a throwback to ancient times, and gives the piece a regal, majestic feel.

Beautiful for yourself, but would also be a knock-out as an engagement ring.

I lurrrrv this ring, and made one for myself!

If you'd like this ring in a size not offered on the menu, just make note of it at checkout.

This ring is made to order in your size, and ready to ship in 10 days.

name: Chocolate Diamond Solitaire Ring
description:
A rich, .50 carat chocolate diamond, set in a handforged 14k setting.  This ring is able to be stacked with a wedding band.

So pretty, so sparkly!

This ring is made to order, and can be made in any size.  Let me know if you'd like it in a size that is not listed.  Ready to ship in 5 days.

name: Amber Seaglass Ring
description:
An organically rectangular piece of Maine seaglass, set in a handforged 14k setting.

The first piece of amber glass I've done, and I love its warm look with the gold. I'll need to do more in this color! 

The front piece measures over 3/4 of an inch across, and 3/8 of an inch from top to bottom. 

This piece is one of a kind, and ready to ship. I will happily size it for you (up to a size 10), and it would be ready to ship in 3 days.

name: Sterling Polka Dot Ring
description:
A wide sterling band with a softly undulating edge, pierced all around and polished to perfection.  The ring measures a bit under 1/2 inch wide, and is suitable for both men and women. Modern, happy, classic.

Also available in a matte, satin finish.  

This piece is a size 7.5, and ready to ship.   I would be happy to size this piece for you, and then it would be ready to ship in three days. 

BECAUSE OF THE WIDTH OF THIS RING, IT IS ADVISABLE TO ORDER A HALF SIZE LARGER THAN YOUR REGULAR SIZE.

name: Simple Diamond Ring
description:
I've been a bit insufferable about this ring, and my friends and family have the patience of saints. I've repeatedly waved it in front of each of them, asking, "Do you wanna see the PRETTY ring I made? Isn't it SPARKLY?" And they respond with such sweetness that you'd think it was the first time I'd shown them, not the thirtieth. Bless them.

But it is so pretty! And shiny! A .25ct champagne diamond sparkles in a simple recycled 14k gold setting, and I've polished it to a high shine. The whole thing is warm and glowy.

Available in sizes 5-9.

For a more delicate diamond ring, see the Champagne Diamond Kiss Ring

name: Sangria Garnet Queen's Ring
description:
My mother, whose birthstone is garnet, believes that she who dies with the most loose garnets, wins. Isn't that silly? Everyone knows that she who gives the most garnets to her daughter, THE JEWELRY ARTIST, wins!

She's a nice Mom, and so recently she turned over part of her stash for the promise of something pretty made for her in the near future. Because really, what are you gonna do with a gazillion loose garnets?

This is one of her garnets. Mom's best friend brought this one (and MANY others) home from India many years ago. I love the color. Sort of a sangria, with flashes of deep wine. So pretty, and I hope I've done it justice with this setting.

The setting is 14k, and created to look like something a medieval queen would wear.

This ring is made to order in your size, and ready to ship in 5 days.

name: Satin Diamond Solitaire
description:
A warm .25ct champagne diamond sits in a simple 14k setting, which has been given a soft satin finish. A relaxed, contemporary spin on the the diamond solitaire. 

Perfect for an engagement ring, or perfect just because you're fabulous and you should buy yourself something pretty. 

Made to order in your size.

name: Ruby Kiss Ring
description:
A beautiful 5mm Burmese ruby sits in the simplest of settings. A kiss of a ring for you!

Setting is 14k gold, and the ruby is the loveliest glowy pink-red.

name: Simple Garnet Solitaire
description:
A simple, solid 14k setting cradles an 8 mm x 6mm garnet. I've angled the bezel so that this ring can be worn comfortably with others.

Simple, feminine, gorgeous.

name: Aquamarine Waterfall Pendant
description:
I love this so much I want to marry it.

A gorgeous teardrop aquamarine cabochon sits above a luminous rainbow moonstone in a 14k hangforged setting. 

The aquamarine looks like a bit of ocean that's been scooped up and made solid, the moonstone like a glowing full moon.  

The pendant is about 1 1/4 inches long, and hangs on an 18 inch chain.

name: Reversible Petal Pendant
description:
A casual summer pendant, the kind of thing you can throw on with a pair of shorts or a fluttery silk dress

Ive forged 14k gold into an organic circle and worked it until no part is left unrounded, almost like a worn piece of shell, or a rose petal. One side is a touchable, soft matte finish, the other is a deep shine. 

5/8 inch across, the pendant is strung on a 16 inch length of Swiss silk cord, and the necklace closes with a 14k spring clasp.

Your choice of Soft Denim, Raspberry, Lavender, Cool Moss, or Spiced Pumpkin cord.


* As each pendant is made to order, I'm happy to adjust the length of cord for you, if you email after ordering.

name: Champagne Diamond Kiss Ring
description: A .25 ct champagne diamond in a slim, handforged 14k setting. Just a kiss of a ring. Warm and sparkly and glowy, this is a lighter, more delicate version of the Simple Diamond Ring.

name: Chunky Gold Hoops
description:
Bling meets artisan, and they are so happy together.

Warm and glowy, wide and lightly hammered 14k half hoops look like lovely liquid gold. Big and chunky looking without being too heavy, and all about the simple beauty of gold.

Almost 1/2 across and over 3/4 of an inch in length (as viewed from front), and made of recycled gold. 14k posts and wing backs.
